_school_checkin
modules.script:
def get_std(row={"name":"-"}): cu = q2cursor("select * from students where name='{name}' and date_of_birth='{date_of_birth}'".format(**row)) if cu.row_count() == 1: row["std"] = cu.r.std return cu.r.std def checkin(row={"name":"-"}): std = get_std(row) if std is None: if insert("students", row): q2mess("Ученик {name} {date_of_birth} дата рождения принят!
Личный номер (код) {std}".format(**row)) else: q2mess(f"Ошибка при приеме ученика!!!

{last_error()}") else: row["std"] = std q2cursor(f"delete from students_subjects where std = {row['std']}") for key, item in row.get("TABLA", {}).items(): item["std"] = row['std'] item["price"] = item['rprice'] item["tmsh"] = 0 if not insert("students_subjects", item): q2mess(f"Ошибка при записи предмета:
{last_error()}") run_form("_school_students", where = f"std={row['std']}") return row['std'] if __name__ == "__main__": data = { "A": "27.06.2024 23:56:26", "B": "my@post.po", "C": "Jan Stur", "D": Танцы) 90 Min./Wo + Tanz 30 Min./Wo, #RP90# #RPT# 70 Є, УкраЇнський (підготовчий клас, 1-3 класи) 120 Min./Wo #UKR#, 70 Є, Беларуский (1-3 класи) 120 Min./Wo #BEL#, 70 Є", "G": "", "H": "Puppentheater-Animation, 2-6 Jahre, Кукольный театр и мультипликация, 2-6 лет, 45 Min/Wo (минут в неделю) , 60/55* Є", "I": "", "J": "", "K": "", "L": "Фортепиано/Klavier 60 Min/Wo (минут в неделю) #KL2#, 135 Є", "M": "", "N": "", "O": "Englisch - Gruppe 60 Min/Wo (минут в неделю) #NHEN1#, 45 Euro pro Monat (в месяц), Englisch - individuell, 45 Min/Wo (минут в неделю) #NHEN2#, 20 Euro pro modules.name: _school_default_row_extender
_school_row_extender
modules.script:
def row_extender(data, id):
    import _school_default_row_extender
    default_row_extender(data, id)
        
    import _school_checkin
    get_std(data)

actions.action_worker:
if self.heap.gd is None: q2mess("Соединение с сервисами Гугл не установлено!
Проверьте настройки") return sheet = mem.heap.load_docs_row() import _school_checkin checkin(sheet)

actions.name: _school_students
actions.action_worker:
askper=Q2Form("Введите период для расчета начислений")
askper.add_control("date1","Период с", datatype="date", data="2024-08-01")
askper.add_control("date2","по", datatype="date", data="2024-08-31")
askper.ok_button=1
askper.cancel_button=1

askper.run()

if askper.ok_pressed:
    sql = f"""select std, sum(price) as summa, "{askper.s.date2}" as date
            from students_subjects
            where date1<= '{askper.s.date1}' and date2>='{askper.s.date2}'
                and price_per_hour = ''
            group by std
            """
    cu=q2cursor(sql)
    for row in cu.records():
        if not get("students_debts", "std={std} and date='{date}'".format(**row), "id"):
            insert("students_debts", row)
    form.refresh()

actions.name: _school_students
actions.action_worker:
askper=Q2Form("Введите период")
askper.add_control("date1","Период с", datatype="date", data="2024-08-01")
askper.add_control("date2","по", datatype="date", data="2024-08-31")
askper.ok_button=1
askper.cancel_button=1

askper.run()

if askper.ok_pressed:
    rep = get_report("_school_Взаиморасчеты")
    if rep:
        rep.params["date1"] = askper.s.date1
        rep.params["date2"] = askper.s.date2
        rep.run()

actions.name: _school_timesheet
actions.action_worker:
sql= """
SELECT
    (select name from timesheet where timesheet.tmsh=subquery.tmsh) as Предмет,
    MAX(CASE WHEN dow = 1 THEN time_value END) AS Понедельник,
    MAX(CASE WHEN dow = 2 THEN time_value END) AS Вторник,
    MAX(CASE WHEN dow = 3 THEN time_value END) AS Среда,
    MAX(CASE WHEN dow = 4 THEN time_value END) AS Четверг,
    MAX(CASE WHEN dow = 5 THEN time_value END) AS Пятница,
    MAX(CASE WHEN dow = 6 THEN time_value END) AS Суббота,
    MAX(CASE WHEN dow = 7 THEN time_value END) AS Воскресенье
FROM (
    SELECT
        id,
        dow,
        tmsh,
        time1,
        concat(time1, "-", time2) AS time_value
    FROM
        timesheet_slots
) AS subquery
GROUP BY
    time_value, id
ORDER BY
    time1
"""

q2cursor(sql).browse()
